## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> class.

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This returns true when the instruction defines a value of a TargetIndex</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operand that can be tracked by offsets. For Wasm, this returns true for only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// local.set/local.tees. This is currently used by LiveDebugValues analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These are not included:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - In theory we need to add global.set here too, but we don&#39;t have global</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   indices at this point because they are relocatable and we address them by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   names until linking, so we don&#39;t have &#39;offsets&#39; (which are used to store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   local/global indices) to deal with in LiveDebugValues. And we don&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   associate debug info in values in globals anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - All other value-producing instructions, i.e. instructions with defs, can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   define values in the Wasm stack, which is represented by TI&#95;OPERAND&#95;STACK</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   TargetIndex. But they don&#39;t have offset info within the instruction itself,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   and debug info analysis for them is handled separately in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   WebAssemblyDebugFixup pass, so we don&#39;t worry about them here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyinstrinfo/#a5255e72bcf98efe146a049652e01d308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyinstrinfo/#a5255e72bcf98efe146a049652e01d308">WebAssemblyInstrInfo::isExplicitTargetIndexDef</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
